
add_custom_command (
  OUTPUT  VColorBars720p.cpp
          VColorBars720p.h
          VColorBars720p__Syms.cpp
          VColorBars720p__Syms.h
  DEPENDS ColorBars720p.v
  COMMAND perl ${VERILATOR} ${VERILATOR_OPTS} -Mdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/ColorBars720p.v
)

# Verilog .v files are added here so that they get added to any IDE project generated by CMake.
add_library (VColorBars720p STATIC
    VColorBars720p.cpp
    VColorBars720p__Syms.cpp
    ColorBars720p.v
)

target_compile_options(VColorBars720p PRIVATE ${VK_CPPFLAGS})

target_include_directories(VColorBars720p PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

target_link_libraries(VColorBars720p verilated)
